overview: Evil Angel auteur Manuel Ferrara's "Slutty & Sluttier 17" continues the big-dicked French director's exploration of the philosophical question, "What makes a woman a slut?" Manuel might not have arrived at any conclusions yet, but he's surely come across some fascinating test subjects! These four scenes feature a wide array of super-slutty talent in nasty, well-crafted vignettes mostly starring the director himself.
title: Slutty & Sluttier 17
